## Biography
I am a senior majoring in behavioral neuroscience and plan to graduate in the spring of 2024. My research interests include what contributes to a positive working alliance and how the working alliance can influence both long term and short term patient outcomes. My career goal is to become a physician, and I plan on applying to medical school within the next couple of years.


## Semesters
